alert.note: Alert for Meriwether; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 7:50PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Meriwether and central Troup Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 749 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Smiths Crossroad to Lincoln Park, and moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain. SOURCE...Reports of minor flooding in Lagrange. IMPACT...Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... LaGrange, Greenville, Woodbury, Warm Springs, Gay, Raleigh, Mountville, Cannonville, Louise, Odessadale, Stovall, Big Springs, Durand, Wares Crossroads, Baughs Crossroads, Harris City, Imlac, Smiths Crossroad and Long Cane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
